standard_response: We will provide detailed pricing and quote information including bulk discounts if applicable.
Our technical team will provide detailed specifications and compatibility information.
Account-related assistance will be provided with identity verification if required.
Return process will be initiated following our 30-day return policy with condition assessment.
Partnership inquiries will be forwarded to our business development team for evaluation.
Complaints will be investigated thoroughly and escalated to management if necessary.
Shipping and logistics information will be provided including tracking details.
Quality issues will be investigated with potential return/exchange or technical support.
Technical documentation and certificates will be provided or sourced from manufacturers.
Bulk order inquiries will receive special pricing and dedicated account management.
